methods.name: bootstrap
methods.desc: Initializes Launch Vest application's global state, sets the admin account, and sets the escrow address.

args.name: txn
args.desc: The payment transaction to fund the escrow address.

methods.name: list_project

args.name: asset_id
args.desc: The unique identifier of the asset.

args.name: image_url
args.desc: The project image url.

args.name: start_timestamp
args.desc: The timestamp when the project starts.

args.name: end_timestamp
args.desc: The timestamp when the project ends.

args.name: claim_timestamp
args.desc: The timestamp for asset claiming.

args.name: price_per_asset
args.desc: The price of each asset.

args.name: min_investment_per_investor
args.desc: The minimum investment per user.

args.name: max_investment_per_investor
args.desc: The maximum investment per user.

args.name: vesting_schedule
args.desc: The vesting schedule of project.

methods.desc: Lists a new IDO Project on LaunchVest.

methods.name: deposit_ido_assets

args.name: txn
args.desc: The asset transfer transaction for the deposit.

args.name: asset
args.desc: The asset to be deposited.

methods.desc: Allows depositing IDO assets using the provided transaction and asset.

methods.name: invest

args.name: is_staking
args.desc: Indicates whether the investor is staking $VEST

args.name: project_id
args.desc: The project (asset) ID to invest in.

args.name: txn
args.desc: The payment transaction for the investment.

args.name: asset_allocation
args.desc: Asset allocation for investor.

methods.desc: Executes an investment transaction for a project.

methods.name: claim_ido_asset

args.name: project_id
args.desc: Project (asset) ID to be claimed.

args.name: is_staking
args.desc: Flag to indicate whether investor is staking $VEST.

methods.desc: Allows users to claim a specific IDO Project asset.

methods.name: reclaim_investment

args.name: project_id
args.desc: Project (asset) ID to be claimed.

args.name: is_staking
args.desc: Flag to indicate whether investor is current staking $VEST.

methods.desc: Allows investors to reclaim their investment.

methods.name: withdraw_amount_raised

args.name: project_id
args.desc: The unique identifier of the project for which funds are withdrawn.

methods.desc: Allows the withdrawal of the amount raised for a specific project, retains LaunchVest fee in the escrow.

methods.name: pause_project

args.name: project_id
args.desc: The unique identifier of the project to be paused.

methods.desc: Allows pausing a project with the specified project ID.

methods.name: unpause_project

args.name: project_id
args.desc: The unique identifier of the project to be un-paused.

methods.desc: Allows un-pausing a project with the specified project ID.

methods.name: change_launchpad_admin

args.name: new_admin_acct
args.desc: The new admin account address.

methods.desc: Allows changing the admin account for the launchpad.

methods.name: get_investor

args.name: investor
args.desc: The Algorand address of the investor to retrieve.

methods.desc: Retrieves investor information for the specified investor address and stores it in the output.

methods.name: get_project

args.name: project_id
args.desc: The unique identifier of the project to retrieve.

methods.desc: Retrieves project information for the specified project ID and stores it in the output.
